userreviews.userReview: Great stories!I love this book series! I have read it more than 20 times since it first came out. One of the best reads ever!!!

AwesomeThough this is a fictional series, it is based on 100% factual information. We each MUST choose God or Satan/Heaven or Hell for all eternity. For me I choose My Jesus the Christ!!! Make the right choice today! We have no promise that tomorrow will come. And No Choice is actually a choice for Satan.
Captivating, Encouraging & Encouraging! An Excellent Read! I Loved It!

The best account for after the raptureRevelations is very hard to read let alone understand. These 12 books give understanding in a real life experience format. It was so wonderful to learn so much about the tribulation and the glorious return in words that were so clear and understandable. I can recommend this series to any level of believer. I myself am going to encourage my daughter who has fallen away from the Lord to read this whole series. Thank you for really great books.

FantasticI couldn't put this book down. There are scripture quotes that I have read in the bible. I know the characters and episodes had to be fictional, but seemed so true to every day life. Praise GOD, I am a Christian, because after reading these books I would certainly turn to my Lord, Jesus Christ. Time is running out. Please turn to JESUS CHRIST.

A Must ReadGiveaways been baffled about what all the symbolism means in the book of Revelations. These books, although fiction, helped me to see what would happen if these events were to happen now. Thoroughly engrossing, enlightening, and a definite must read!

I have read all these books, and they are great. I usually won't stick it out this long in a series, but I just had to with these. I needed to know what happens next, they are very well written, and they fall into what I believe. They are great.

worth readingAlthough the series is long and sometimes winded it is a great read for every Christian. And for those who wonder about Christianity. It is well worth keeping to help remind me of my need to walk always with Christ.

This series of booksThis series of books were eye opening and brought you close to the characters and Jesus! These books so intricately explain the end of times that I feel completely ready to meet Jesus...Love..Love..Love!!
Really great series is all I can say.
Thank youI read this year's ago. Glad to re-read. Praying to renew my faith and increase my studies. Great books scary to wonder if you're were you are supposed to be.

Although this is an interesting story line and a collection of well written books, it is important for readers to remember this is fiction. The authors, I believe, have used the Bible to change the ideas put forth to change the way people see the affect of Biblical predictions. Too many people believe the books are non-fiction and are trying to use the words of the story to bring about the second coming. The books are a made up story and should be read as such. I don;t know if the authors wrote the books to make money or to change the thinking of many. So the books receive 3 stars.

Fascinating!Fascinating read, leading to a thorough examination of scripture as it relates to current events. This work is effective in provoking critical thinking about the reader's own life as it relates to scripture in the Holy Bible, whether or not they are currently a believer in Jesus Christ.

Unexpectedly goodI never thought I would read this series, nor like it. I was wrong, in fact I love it. There were a few dry spots here and there, but that comes from lack of knowledge when it comes to the bible. But rest assured, this series is excellent, and I highly recommend it, whether you are a Christian or not.
The book of Revelation brought to lifeVery exciting and wonderfully accurate. I learned so much by reading this series. I'd recommend it to anyone; forever changed my outlook and my faith.
I am so lost for words!

I've read this series before and I bought it again on kindle because I got the entire series for $22.If you're a Sci-Fi/Fantasy fan, you might enjoy this. Just ignore the theology, if it doesn't work for you. The character development is excellent - they change in fairly realistic ways. For example, just because one character becomes a "Tribulation Saint" (which is what they call the post-Rapture believers) doesn't mean he doesn't still cuss. He works on it because he believes it's bad but that's realistic, I think. I don't particularly like some of the stereotypes that the authors use but they are fundamentalist Christians, so I suppose that's to be expected.I view the theology of this as any other created world and just enjoy the story for what it is. There are a fair number of biblical quotations but they seem like they belong to the story, not just gratuitous.
AssionsGood job did not want to put it down. This was my third time reading the series and could possible make it a fourth time..

Page turner from the very start!What a wonderful book collection. I was truly hooked from the very beginning, I have had my nose in this series for a few weeks. It is midnight as I write this review, I mean hey who has time for sleep when you have such an amazing read waiting on you. The authors did a wonderful Job putting the bible into perspective. If you were not saved before reading this series you will be soon! It is a emotional rollercoaster of excitement, joy, love, laughter, fear and any other emotion you can think of. I have fallen in love with every character. Happy reading.

Really 4.5 StarsBetter than 4 stars, but not quite a perfect 5.0! Mainly because the last book went on a little long. It was an exciting series! I was glad I read it as a collection and didn't have to wait for the next book to be published! It was definitely true to the Bible, often quoting it word for word. And the message of how to have a relationship with Jesus was clear. Each book also did a good job of reviewing what had taken place up to that point. I am about to read the sequel, to be followed shortly by the prequels!

Captivating, Inspiring, and SatisfyingI read the three prequel books after watching the first two movies. Then I delved into the entire series beginning to end. I could barely stand to STOP reading! While the characters and their situations are fictional, the prophecies and Biblical references were spot-on. I come away from this with a renewed spirit and determination to follow my Lord and share His message of salvation.

Not the best written books I've ever read. There were days I didn't even feel the need to pick it up. But unquestionably the best plot I've ever read! This series brought to life the end time prophecies for me. I had picked up another book by my favorite author which I intended to read after this. But I'll be returning it to the library without opening it. I'm eager to get into some kind of end times study now while eagerly await the return of Jesus!!

Wow!I chose this rating because this series was that good. I could not put it down. Although it is fiction, who knows how things will be in the end for sure? I would recommend this series to any one who is curious about these end times.

I like these books. The story does get heavier as you get deeper into it. To be honest though, I have not read past 'The Harvest' book though. It got a little too heavy for me. But I still enjoy the books.Thanks for the read. We continue to enjoy them :-)
This is just a storyIt is gripping then it loses that and it kept my curiosity to wonder how the author thought things would be in heaven on earth. I still must remember this is just a story.
Second time!I just read the marathon of all of these books. Enjoyed them more this time as I just completed a 5 month study of Revelation.
Second reading of this series.
Today's headlinesProphecy being fulfilled in our life time. Praying all I love to be ready. Come King Jesus! Hearts softens by your Spirit.
Have read it for the second time, love it and will read it again. This is the second time that I have read it, will recommend itStill fascinating. Love the movie and the books
Great storyIt was a good story. I had a hard time stopping to sleep. I couldn't put the book down. On to the next one.

   Political crisis 
   Economic crisis 
   Worldwide epidemics 
   Environmental catastrophe 
   Military apocalypse 
 And that’s just the beginning . . .of the end of the world.“This is the most successful Christian-fiction series ever.”—Publishers Weekly“Tim LaHaye and Jerry Jenkins . . . are doing for Christian fiction what John Grisham did for courtroom thrillers.”—Time“Combines Tom Clancy–like suspense with touches of romance, high-tech flash, and biblical references.”—New York Times“Wildly popular—and highly controversial.”—USA Today“Call it what you like, the Left Behind series . . . now has a label its creators could have never predicted: blockbuster success.”—Entertainment WeeklyContains the following titles:#1: Left Behind#2: Tribulation Force#3: Nicolae#4: Soul Harvest#5: Apollyon#6: Assassins#7: The Indwelling#8: The Mark#9: Desecration#10: The Remnant#11: Armageddon#12: Glorious Appearing
